attributes.action: Listen to, and act upon, the petitions presented on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petitions presented on this site are, in the main, sincerely meant and in some cases are gathering thousands of signatures. However it seems from media reports that Downing St is ignoring petitions here, possibly as the site is permanently "in a public 'beta test'". We the undersigned ask that the Government either act upon these petitions or switch the site off as it appears to be a displacement activity from Parliamentary process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
